channel.title: Need a good safezone coder!
channel.description:
hi people, I need a safezone coder, as it isnt working for me to tell me the code i need.
go to: pkmad.no-ip.org port: 43594
and help me
Many Thanks James.

item.title: Need a good safezone coder!
item.dc:creator: @F00L_I_K0 F00L I K0
item.description:
@F00L_I_K0 wrote:

Purpose: How To Make A Safe Zone

Difficulty: 2

Assumed Knowledge: Have a normal thought process

Server Base: PimpScape

Classes Modified: Client

Procedure
Step 1: Search For:

public boolean nonWild() {

Step 2: Mine looks like this:

public boolean nonWild() { if((absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3258 && absY >= 3438 && absY <=3431 ) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3260 && absY >=3435 && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3253 && absY >=3431 && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >=3250 && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419 && absY <=3423 ) ||(absX >=3250 && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419 && absY <=3423 )||(absX >=3459 && absX <=3510 && absY >=9479 && absY <=9519 )||(absX >=3253 && absX <=3254 && absY >=3423 && absY <=3431 )|| heightLevel == 1) return true; else return false; }

Step 3: Its in this form:

(absX  >=Bottom left point && absX <=Bottom right point && absY >=Top right point && <=Top left point)||

Where it says Bottom left point, etc thats where you put the Co-Ordinates.

The || is important because it seperates the different areas. and this area that you are making needs to be a square.

Credits: To Original Poster.

Read full topic
